response_parsed.title: Harding Web Backends with FastAPI in Python 3.12+
response_parsed.summary: Learn how to secure and improve the performance of your web backends using FastAPI, a modern, fast (high-performance), web framework for building APIs with Python 3.12+.
key_points: Adoption of FastAPI: A high-performance, modern web framework for building APIs in Python
Routing and Request Handling: Simplified routing and request handling using the `FastAPI` and `Depends` functionalities
Automatic generation of OpenAPI documentation: Swagger-like documentation automatically generated from your code
Built-in support for asyncio: Improved performance due to built-in support for asynchronous operations
Security Best Practices: Incorporation of security best practices such as input validation, content security policy (CSP), and more
Middleware and Plugins: Extensibility through the use of middleware and plugins to further customize your application

code_examples.code:
from fastapi.middleware.cors import CORSMiddleware

app = FastAPI()

app.add_middleware(CORSMiddleware, allow_origins=['*'])
